title: Battrixx aims to have strong presence in electric 2-, 3-wheeler segments
description: Battrixx, which is the battery division of Kabra ExtrusionTechnik, late last year had announced it will raise up to Rs 301 crore for the expansion of the brand, which includes raising the annual battery packs production capacity to seven lakh by the end of FY24, from one lakh at present.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
